org.tantalum.jme

Class JMELog

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tantalum.util.L
      • org.tantalum.jme.JMELog

  • public class JMELog
extends L
    Debug-time logging implementation for JME To enable logging from a phone connected to a computer by a USB cable, open a terminal emulator on the window, set the COM port parameters in Windows Devices, and call L.startUSBDebugging() at program start. This gives you a running list of how long each operation takes which is helpful for on-device-debug, application profiling and seeing how concurrency is behaving on device which may be different from the slower emulator.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JMELog(boolean routeDebugOutputToSerialPort)
      Create a new platform-specific logger implementation Do not access this directly.
